Ciao

/tʃaʊ/

I’m Sanket, an aspiring researcher working in the domain of Deep Learning, Computer Vision and Machine Learning with a focus on Multi Modal Deep learning. I am currently a PhD student at PAVIS, Italian Institute of Technology under the supervision of Dr. Alessio Del Bue.

Previously, I have worked with Nokia Bell Labs , SmartVizx , Ernst and Young with their research department. Besides, I had two startups during my college and filed two provisional patents. I have also been an active participant in technical communities and presented multiple technical talks and workshops at various level(s).

Passionate about Generative models, Egocentric vision & Multi modal learning.

Checkout my latest podcast !

Hit me up and lets make another podcast.
